name: vscode-deploy-reloaded
description: Deploys files of a workspace to a destination.

checkForRequirements.description: Defines one or more conditions by (JavaScript) code.

oneOf.description: The condition.
Settings for a condition.

isMustHave.description: Skip loading the configuration (true), when condition fails, or show a warning message instead (false).

name.description: The custom (display) name of the condition.

platforms.description: One or more platform names the entry is available for.

initBower.description: Runs 'bower install' inside the workspace folder on startup, if a 'bower.json' file exists and NO 'bower_components' folder has been found.

initComposer.description: Runs 'composer install' inside the workspace folder on startup, if a 'composer.json' file exists and NO 'vendor' folder has been found.

initNodeModules.description: Runs 'npm install' inside the workspace folder on startup, if a 'package.json' file exists and NO 'node_modules' folder has been found.

language.description: The custom ID of the language to use (e.g. 'en', 'de').

openOutputOnStartup.description: Open the output window after config has been reloaded or not.

cwd.description: The custom working directory for the execution to use.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code, which indicates, if entry is available or not.

ignoreIfFail.description: Continue when operation fails or not.

maxBuffer.description: Largest amount of data in bytes allowed on stdout or stderr.

noPlaceHolders.description: Do not use placeholders in 'command' property.

printOutput.description: Print the result from stdout to output channel or not.

type.description: Executes a shell command inside the workspace.

body.description: The body or the path to a script that returns the body to send.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code, which indicates, if entry is available or not.

ignoreIfFail.description: Continue when operation fails or not.

isBodyBase64.description: Indicates if 'body' is Base64 encoded or not.

isBodyScript.description: Indicates if 'body' contains the path to a script instead the content to send.

noPlaceholdersForTheseHeaders.description: A list of headers that should NOT use placeholders / values.

oneOf.description: A list of headers that should NOT use placeholders / values.

items.description: The name of the header that should NOT use placeholders / values.

oneOf.description: Defines if placeholders should be DEactivated for ALL headers or not.

options.description: The options for the script that returns the body to send.

type.description: Does a HTTP request.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code, which indicates, if entry is available or not.

ignoreIfFail.description: Continue when operation fails or not.

options.description: Additional options for the script execution.

script.description: The path to the script file.
